topics.title: Jan-ganana: Itihas aur Prishthbhumi
slides: [cite_start]"• **Prachin Itihas:** Bharat mein jan-ganana (Census) karne ke sabse prachin saakshya Chanakya ki pustak **'Arthashastra'** mein milte hain[cite: 2996]."
[cite_start]"• **Adhunik Shuruat:** Adhunik pranali ke roop mein pehli baar jan-ganana **1872** mein **Lord Mayo** ke shasan kaal mein hui thi[cite: 2997]."
[cite_start]"• **Vidhiwat Jan-ganana:** Bharat mein vidhiwat (regular) jan-ganana **1881** mein **Lord Ripon** ke kaal mein shuru hui, jo tab se har 10 varsh mein hoti hai[cite: 2998, 2999]."
[cite_start]"• **Vishesh Diwas:** Prati varsh **11 July** ko 'Vishwa Jansankhya Niyantran Diwas' manaya jata hai[cite: 3000]."

[cite_start]"• **Madhya Pradesh ki Sthiti:** Varsh 2011 ki jan-ganana, Madhya Pradesh ke gathan (1956) ke baad ki **6th** jan-ganana hai[cite: 3005]. [cite_start]Rajya mein pehli jan-ganana **1961** mein hui thi[cite: 3006]."

questions.questionText: Jan-ganana ke saakshya kis prachin pustak mein milte hain?
Bharat mein pehli adhunik jan-ganana kab hui thi?
Vidhiwat jan-ganana ki shuruat kis ke karyakaal mein hui?
Vishwa Jansankhya Niyantran Diwas kab manaya jata hai?
1956 ke baad varsh 2011 ki jan-ganana MP ki kaun si jan-ganana hai?
Lord Mayo ke samay pehli jan-ganana kis varsh hui?
Lord Ripon ne vidhiwat jan-ganana kis varsh shuru karwayi?
Madhya Pradesh mein pehli jan-ganana kis varsh hui thi?

topics.title: MP Jansankhya aur Tulna (2011)
slides: [cite_start]"• **Kul Jansankhya:** 2011 ke anusar MP ki jansankhya **7.26 crore** hai, jabki Bharat ki 121 crore[cite: 3011]."
[cite_start]"• **Jansankhya Vriddhi:** MP ki jansankhya vriddhi dar **20.35%** rahi, jo Bharat (17.7%) se adhik hai[cite: 3011]."
[cite_start]"• **Jan-Ghanatva:** MP ka jansankhya ghanatva **236** vyakti prati varg km hai (Bharat ka 382)[cite: 3011, 3054]."
[cite_start]"• **Sarvadhik Jansankhya wale Jile:** MP mein sabse adhik jansankhya **Indore** (32.76 lakh) ki hai, iske baad Jabalpur aur Sagar ka sthan hai[cite: 3016]."

[cite_start]"• **Nyunतम Jansankhya wale Jile:** Vartaman mein sabse kam jansankhya **Pandhurna** (3.74 lakh) ki hai, phir Niwari aur Harda[cite: 3020]. [cite_start]2011 ki jan-ganana ke anusar Harda sabse kam jansankhya wala zila tha[cite: 3021]."

questions.questionText: 2011 ke anusar Madhya Pradesh ki kul jansankhya kitni hai?
Jansankhya vriddhi dar (2001-2011) Madhya Pradesh mein kitni rahi?
Madhya Pradesh ka jansankhya ghanatva kitna hai?
MP mein sarvadhik jansankhya wala zila kaun sa hai?
Vartaman mein MP ka sabse kam jansankhya wala zila kaun sa hai?
2011 jan-ganana ke anusar sabse kam jansankhya wala zila kaun sa tha?
Indore ki jansankhya 2011 ke anusar lagbhag kitni thi?
Sarvadhik jansankhya mein Indore ke baad dusra sthan kiska hai?

topics.title: Kshetraphal (Area) ke Anusar Jile
slides: [cite_start]"• **Sarvadhik Kshetraphal:** Vartaman portal ke anusar **Shivpuri** (10666 sq km) sabse bada zila hai[cite: 3025]. [cite_start]Lekin 2011 ki jan-ganana mein **Chhindwara** sabse bada zila tha[cite: 3026]."
[cite_start]"• **Nyuntam Kshetraphal:** Sabse kam kshetraphal wala zila **Niwari** (1170 sq km) hai, iske baad Datia aur Bhopal aate hain[cite: 3030]."

questions.questionText: 2011 jan-ganana ke anusar kshetraphal mein sabse bada zila kaun sa tha?
Vartaman aankdon ke anusar kshetraphal mein sabse bada zila kaun sa hai?
Madhya Pradesh ka sabse kam kshetraphal wala zila kaun sa hai?
Niwari ka kshetraphal kitna hai?
